user.title: Set up SMARTi
user.description: Select the version of SMARTi you want to configure.

basic_token_choice.title: Basic Version: Token Setup
basic_token_choice.description: Do you already have a token?

generate_token.title: Generate Basic Token
generate_token.description: Enter your email address to generate a token for the Basic version. The token will be sent to your email.

basic_token_input.title: Enter Basic Token
basic_token_input.description: Input the token you received for the Basic version.

pro_link.title: Purchase SMARTi Pro
pro_link.description: Click the link below to purchase SMARTi Pro: {link}

pro_token_input.title: Enter Pro Token
pro_token_input.description: Input the token you received after purchasing SMARTi Pro.

error.invalid_subscription: The provided email does not have an active subscription.
error.token_generation_failed: Failed to generate token. Please try again.
